clinical_study.brief_title: Analysis of the Ligamentization Process in the Anatomical Ligamentoplasty of the Lateral Ankle Plane to the Hamstrings
clinical_study.official_title: Analysis of the Ligamentization Process in the Anatomical Ligamentoplasty of the Lateral Ankle Plane to the Hamstrings

detailed_description.textblock: The eligible patients will be enrolled in the department of orthopaedic surgery of Ambroise Paré hospital, each patient will undergo a 12-months follow-up in the department of orthopaedic surgery in Armand Trousseau hospital for the elastography evaluations.

secondary_outcome.description: anterior talofibular ligament measurement will be performed by RMI
calcaneofibular ligament measurement will be performed by RMI
By the American Orthopedic Foot and Ankle Score (AOFAS) to evaluate the pain.
By the visual analog scale (VAS) to evaluate the pain.

arm_group.description: Patient treated priorly by ligament plastic surgery of lateral ankle plane under arthroscopy

intervention.description: Ligament plastic surgery of ankle under arthroscopy for recurrent instable ankle reason and failure of medical treatment.
RMI examination at 3 months on operated ankle, and 3 CT scan examinations with elastography module will be performed at planned timeframes.

study_pop.textblock: Patients underwent a ligament plastic surgery of lateral ankle plane under arthroscopy.
